recipe.title: Pink Panther
instructions: In a cocktail shaker, combine mint sprigs with Místico and crush with the back of a spoon. Add grapefruit juice and strain into tall glass three-fourths full of ice cubes. Top off drink with lemon-lime soda and garnish with mint sprig.
